I prefer is exoteric science versus
esoteric science and I'd like to do a
quick comparison of those two so
exoteric science is outwardly turned in
that we are in ourselves looking out at
the world it has an objective approach
in that we consider anything that we're
viewing outside of ourselves
as an object of study the material realm
is the focus of our investigation we use
outer senses and apparatuses such as
telescopes and microscopes to help us
understand what we're perceiving these
are our instruments of investigation it
tends to be experimental in nature and
the results are usually described by
mathematics and statistics so by
contrast East esoteric or so-called
Eastern science is more inward turn the
focus is within ourselves there's a
subjective approach in as much as we're
paying attention to the contents of our
own consciousness states of
consciousness and subtle realms are the
focuses of our investigation we use
inner senses instead of outer senses as
the instruments of investigation and it
tends to be experiential as opposed to
experimental and finally the description
is by personal testimony as opposed to
mathematics and statistics this is
something of course that is not really
tolerated by science they call it
anecdotal but personal testimony has
been important throughout the entire
history of humanity in terms of
investigating not only what goes on
inside of ourselves but also what goes
on outside of ourselves I view a
similarity of method between esoteric

we learn to observe under ideal
